title: Should I put my PGP Key-ID in my email signature? - Quora

response.answer_text: Include the public key fingerprint in your email signature in order to provide the recipient a validation reference when they import your public key from a pubkey server. You could also include a direct link to you pubkey on the server. Here’s mine. https://pgp.mit.edu/pks/lookup?search=bryan+howarth&op=index&fingerprint=on Fingerprint=CFC3 3A18 7903 571B E462  79F5 DE35 699D 2B7F 1510
